Job Description: Job Description     Hands- on experience in creating and executing test scripts using open source tools like Jmeter and Gatling and commercial tools. Must be necessarily proficient in Jmeter and Gatling.     Web commerce project exposure is a plus.     Have executed at least 2 large scale engagements with Jmeter.     Have knowledge/experience on Load Runner will be an add on.     Have knowledge/experience on Dynatrace/AppDynamics/New relic will be an add on.     Understanding of Software engineering and testing methodologies in the context of large scale enterprise systems.     Experience in testing high volume web and batch based transaction enterprise applications.     Experience in setup and management of test environments on different platforms (Windows/ Unix).     Experience in creating workload models and collecting performance requirements from the stake holders.     Good understanding of troubleshooting performance issues encountered during performance testing.
